trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Out-Host
trans-unit.target: Out-Host

trans-unit.source: Out-Host
trans-unit.target: Out-Host

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Sends output to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 将输出发送到命令行。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Out-Host** cmdlet sends output to the Windows PowerShell host for display.
trans-unit.target: **Out-host** cmdlet 将输出发送到 Windows PowerShell 主机以供显示。

trans-unit.source: The host displays the output at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 该主机在命令行上显示输出。

trans-unit.source: Because **Out-Host** is the default, you do not have to specify it unless you want to use its parameters to change the display.
trans-unit.target: 因为 **Out-host** 是默认情况下，无需指定它，除非你想要使用其参数来更改显示。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Display system processes one page at a time
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 显示系统一次处理一页

trans-unit.source: This command displays the processes on the system one page at a time.
trans-unit.target: 此命令一次显示一页系统上的进程。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-Process cmdlet to get the processes on the system.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-process cmdlet 来获取系统上的进程。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator sends the results to **Out-Host**, which displays them at the console.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将发送到结果 **Out-host**, ，这将在控制台上显示它们。

trans-unit.source: The *Paging* parameter displays one page of data at a time.
trans-unit.target: *分页* 参数一次显示一页的数据。

trans-unit.source: The same command format is used for the Help function that is built into Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 将相同的命令格式用于内置于 Windows PowerShell 中的 Help 函数。

trans-unit.source: That function gets data from the Get-Help cmdlet and then uses the *Paging* parameter of **Out-Host** to display the data one page at a time by using this command format: `Get-Help $Args\[0\] | Out-Host -Paging`.
trans-unit.target: 函数从 Get-help cmdlet 中获取数据，然后使用 *分页* 参数 **Out-host** 若要使用此命令格式一次显示一页数据︰ `Get-Help $Args\[0\] | Out-Host -Paging`。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Display session history
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 显示会话历史记录

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Get-History cmdlet to get the session history, and then it stores the history in the $a variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 Get-history cmdlet 来获取会话历史记录，并将它存储历史记录在 $a 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses **Out-Host** to display the content of the $a variable, and it uses the *InputObject* parameter to specify the variable to **Out-Host**.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Out-host** 来显示的变量，而且它使用的 $ 内容 *InputObject* 参数来指定变量 **Out-host**。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the objects that are written to the console.
trans-unit.target: 指定要写入控制台的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含对象的变量，或键入可获取对象的命令或表达式。

trans-unit.source: -Paging
trans-unit.target: 分页

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet displays one page of output at a time, and waits for user input before it displays the remaining pages, much like the traditional **more** command.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 一次显示一个输出页，并等待用户输入，然后再显示剩余页面，非常类似于传统 **详细** 命令。

trans-unit.source: By default, all of the output is displayed on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有输出都显示在一页上。

trans-unit.source: The page size is determined by the characteristics of the host.
trans-unit.target: 页大小由主机的特征确定。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe any object to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递给此 cmdlet 的任何对象。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: However, the host might display the objects that **Out-Host** sends to it.
trans-unit.target: 但是，主机可能会显示这些对象的 **Out-host** 发送给它。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the **Out** verb (the **Out** cmdlets) do not format objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 cmdlet **出** 谓词 ( **出** cmdlet)，不要格式化对象。

trans-unit.source: They just render objects and send them to the specified display destination.
trans-unit.target: 它们只呈现对象，并将其发送给指定的显示目标。

trans-unit.source: If you send an unformatted object to an **Out** cmdlet, the cmdlet sends it to a formatting cmdlet before rendering it.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送到的未格式化的对象 **出** cmdlet，该 cmdlet 将其发送到格式化 cmdlet 在呈现它之前。

trans-unit.source: The **Out** cmdlets do not have parameters for names or file paths.
trans-unit.target: **出** cmdlet 没有用于名称或文件路径参数。

trans-unit.source: To send data to an **Out** cmdlet, use a pipeline operator (|) to send the output of a Windows PowerShell command to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据发送到 **出** cmdlet，使用管道运算符 (|) 将 Windows PowerShell 命令的输出发送到 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can also store data in a variable and use the *InputObject* parameter to pass the data to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以将数据存储在变量中，并使用 *InputObject* 将数据传递给 cmdlet 的参数。

trans-unit.source: For help, see the examples.
trans-unit.target: 有关帮助，请参阅示例。

trans-unit.source: **Out-Host** sends data, but it does not emit any output objects.
trans-unit.target: **Out-host** 发送数据，但它不会发出任何输出对象。

trans-unit.source: If you pipe the output of **Out-Host** to the Get-Member cmdlet, **Get-Member** reports that no objects have been specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过管道传递的输出 **Out-host** 给 Get-member cmdlet， **Get-member** 报告未指定任何对象。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
